pr_title: Fix | Sort column ordinal mapping during bulk copy

timeline.bodyText: If the columnMetadata Map objects implemented in the SQLServerBulkRecord classes were TreeMap objects instead of HashMap, you wouldn't need to sort the keyset you retrieve here. However I'm not sure if the cost of lookups/inserts going from O(1) to O(logN) would be worth that trade off.
timeline.author: rene-ye

timeline.bodyText: Why is this in a different file? Please move this to the same file as the test.
timeline.author: ulvii

replies.bodyText: This interface already has another (very similar) bulk data class used for test, so I think it makes sense to keep this code here.
replies.author: peterbae

replies.bodyText: That class is only used inside the same test file. I would keep  the required classes for a test inside its own file.
replies.author: ulvii
